file_content.text: Cipher Nine to ship.
I'm on my way to the Nightmare Lands.
The Voss have shown me their sacred carvings and I'm on my way to the Nightmare Lands. A Sith named Murbek Gehn is helping me find safe passage.
The Voss have shown me their sacred carvings, and informed me that a Sith--Murbek Gehn--can provide safe passage into the Nightmare Lands.
All evidence indicates our conspirator came from there. I mean to seek out the Shining Man's base of operations and learn the conspiracy's connection to this world.
Last wedding I was at? Black dress, heels, groom looked fantastic but I looked better... slipped on that ring and ran.
You never told me that story. Who was it?
You almost got married?
A guy. Got a bloody nose and that dress freaking chafed, but it was the best night of my life. Your girl's here, by the way.
You don't have anything to worry about. I'm not interested in Yana-Ton.
I promise, it's just for show.
Who's worried?
I know what you're doing. It won't work.
You're not making me jealous.
What? Just trying to share.
Are you going to dress up for your big day? It's so exciting!
I never thought I'd be a guest at your wedding. I didn't even bring a gift.
Think of it as an elaborate piece of theater. One I'm glad you're here for.
I promise, it's just for show.
I'm glad I'm here, too. Say hello to your bride.
You worried I'm falling for the Voss?
Don't tell me you're jealous?
I'm worried she doesn't know what she's in for.
This is the job. Without Bas-Ton, I need an in with that family.
Spare me the sarcasm.
I'm aware of that, sir. Go meet your bride.
Sir? I know it's just for show, and I know we're chasing conspirators, but... I'm really very excited for you.
You're really going to marry a Voss? But then, we've always questioned your taste in men.
If I wanted Phi-Ton, you would know. But we need this, and I need your support.
I promise, it's just for show.
You have it. The groom is coming now.
Afraid the pheromones are wearing off?
You're cute when you're upset.
Our charm is all we need. Your groom is coming.
This is the job, Vector. Without Bas-Ton, I need an in with that family.
Spare me the jealousy.
The groom is coming.
We've never seen a Voss wedding. It should be an experience.
Congratulations. Just be glad you don't have to move into the teahouse when you're done.
Every bond you create saps your strength as an individual.
To be proper, we would ride boliphants here through incense clouds.
This is proper enough.
You can still back out if you want.
You're sure you want this?
Thank you. No.
I'm on top of a mountain on a beautiful world with a very kind man. It's proper enough for me, too.
It's perfect, Phi-Ton.
Skip the ceremony. Where do I sign?
Let's get this over with.
This scroll contains our oaths. Read, and I will begin.
You, who have no family, come to join the family of Niya-Ton, who birthed Zhi-Ton under the Prophecy of Ten Thousand Seeds.
You come to bind yourself to a son of Bas-Ton. We are children. Will you become Voss with me?
I will become Voss with you, a child no longer.
I speak the words of ceremony.
Hey, sure, why not?
Being Chiss has gotten old. Being Voss means a fresh start.
I've always wanted to be an alien.
You know why we're here. Move it along.
The clock's ticking.
Of course.
Will you embrace the traditions of our people? Will you walk with the Voss to our destiny?
I will walk the thousand-year path, so long as you are beside me.
Phi-Ton, will you pledge your dreams? Pour your life into my cupped hands, as I will for you?
I would have no other.
Then we walk before the flame.
Here's where I ask if you pledge yourself to me?
Yes. I will pledge my dreams. Pour my life into your cupped hands, as you will for me.
I might as well.
Will you pledge me your dreams? Pour your life into my cupped hands, as I will for you?
Fine, I do.
Walk with me before the flame.
So long as prophecy allows, we are one. Only the word of a Mystic will break our bond. May it never happen.
Only the Rite of Ardor remains. We may end here if you wish.
You may as well tell me.
What is it?
We've come this far. Why not see it through?
I want to do this right.
On Voss, our passions are suppressed until marriage.
The Rite of Ardor awakens intensity and creates a bond between husband and wife.
Will you spend this night with me?
I wish you all the best, but let's not make this marriage more than it is.
I'm flattered, but no.
I'll help awaken your passions.
Let's perform the rite.
In the morning, we will show you the sacred carvings. You can walk into darkness.
We have hours until then.
I don't know how or what you people "awaken," but I don't want any part of it.
That's disgusting.
Forgive me.
When do I get to see the carvings?
Let's move on, then.
Therod-Ton and the others gather. They will walk us to the carvings of the Nightmare Lands. No one will deny us.
Our family is gathered. We will celebrate first, then walk you to the carvings. No one will deny your right to see.
You might accept me, and Therod-Ton might, but the guards...
Will this be enough?
You are one of us.
No time to waste. The Nightmare Lands are waiting.
Let's go.
I was hoping to spend some time with my husband.
What, no honeymoon?
That is not why we joined together.
Tomorrow morning, you will journey into darkness. We will find the path now.
A veil is for women when a family member is lost.
What we do defies custom. No veil is right.
You can still back out if you want.
You're sure you want this?
For my father, for you and for myself.
Whatever it is we're doing, I wouldn't want anyone else.
You look beautiful.
Skip the ceremony. Where do I sign?
Let's get this over with.
This scroll contains our oaths. Read, and I will begin.
You, who have no family, come to join the family of Niya-Ton, who birthed Zhi-Ton under the Prophecy of Ten Thousand Seeds.
You come to bind yourself to a daughter of Bas-Ton. We are children. Will you become Voss with me?
I will become Voss with you, a child no longer.
I speak the words of ceremony.
Of course.
Being Chiss has gotten old. Being Voss means a fresh start.
I've always wanted to be an alien.
You know why we're here. Move it along.
The clock's ticking.
Ah. Yes.
Will you embrace the traditions of our people? Will you walk with the Voss to our destiny?
I will walk the thousand-year path, so long as you are beside me.
Yana-Ton, will you pledge your dreams? Pour your life into my cupped hands, as I will for you?
I would have no other.
Then we walk before the flame.
Here's where I ask if you pledge yourself to me?
It is. I will.
I might as well.
Will you pledge me your dreams? Pour your life into my cupped hands, as I will for you?
Fine, I do.
Walk with me before the flame.
So long as prophecy allows, we are one. Only the word of a Mystic will break our bond.
The ritual is over, except for the Rite of Ardor. We don't need to participate.
You may as well tell me.
What is it?
We've come this far. Why not see it through?
I want to do this properly.
A Voss's passions are suppressed until marriage. The first night awakens them, creates a bond between husband and wife.
If you wish to see the rite through... I would be with you.
I wish you all the best, but let's not make this marriage more than it is.
I'm flattered, but no.
Spend the night with me, Yana-Ton.
Let's perform the rite.
In the morning, you will see the sacred carvings. You can walk into darkness.
For now, we are together.
I don't know how or what you people "awaken," but I don't want any part of it.
That's disgusting.
I understand.
When do I get to see the carvings?
Let's move on, then.
Our family is gathering. They will walk us to the carvings of the Nightmare Lands. No one will deny us.
The ritual is over. Our family will gather and celebrate, then walk us to the carvings. Our commandos cannot deny you.
You might accept me, and Therod-Ton might, but the guards....
Will this be enough?
You have touched the Sacred Flame. You smell Voss. All my family will support you.
No time to waste. The Nightmare Lands are waiting.
Let's go.
I was hoping to spend some time with my wife.
What, no honeymoon?
Bas-Ton would want you to go.
Tomorrow morning, you will journey into darkness. We will find the path now.
